CustomField.description: Field to mapping the Products portal value into the Product Salesforce Case
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Product_Portal__c), "Video Cloud", "Video Cloud", "Zencoder", "Zencoder", "Gallery", "Gallery", /*"Ooyala", "Ooyala",*/ "TV App Agency", "OTT", "Beacon", "OTT", "Engage", "Brightcove Engage", "Campaign", "Brightcove Campaign", "Wicket Labs", "Wicket Labs", "Brightcove Interactivity (HapYak)", "HapYak", NULL)
CustomField.label: Mapping Product
